problem.script: omega="sqrt(6*g/L)" v_e="sqrt(6*g*L)" a_xe=0 v_m="sqrt(3*g*L/2)" alpha=0 a_ye="6*g" a_xm=0 a_ym="3*g" F_x=0 F_y="4*m*g"
problem.p: At the instant the bar is at the bottom of the swing, find the magnitudes of the following quantities:
The horizontal component of the force exerted on the bar by the hinge \(F_x=\)
The vertical component of the force exerted on the bar by the hinge \(F_y=\)
